ui.title: Takedown Request Builder
ui.select_platform_desc: Piliem ti platform nu sadino a napasamak ti insidente tapno makaprugi.
ui.generic_builder_desc: Mangted ti details maipapan ti insidente tapno maka-generate ti standardized takedown request document.
ui.placeholder_incident_desc: Please describe nu ania ti napasamak nga saan a nag-share ti sobra a sensitive personal data...
ui.error_desc_required: Please provide a description ti insidente tapno ma-generate ti document.

pdf.title: Formal Online Harassment / Takedown Request
pdf.subject: Subject: Formal Takedown Request regarding Online Harassment
pdf.intro: I am writing to formally request the removal of content or action regarding an incident on your platform.
pdf.closing: This request is made in accordance with digital safety guidelines and platform policies regarding user safety and harassment.

youtube.name: YouTube
youtube.overview: Ti YouTube ket addaan tools tapno i-report ti cyberbullying, harassment, ken dadduma pay a policy violations. Mabalinmo nga i-report ti specific videos, comments, wenno intero a channels.

screenshots.0: Screenshot ti video wenno comment a maseknan.
screenshots.2: Screenshot ti aniaman a direct messages wenno interactions (no adda).

tips.0: Iraman ti direct URL ti video wenno comment.
tips.1: Agbalin a specific no ania a paset ti video ti nag-violate ti policies.
tips.2: Saanen a patulan wenno sumungbat ti harasser kadagiti comments.

tiktok.name: TikTok
tiktok.overview: Adda dedicated safety center ti TikTok para ti panag-report ti hate speech, harassment, ken bullying. Dagiti report ket anonymous.

screenshots.0: Screenshot ti video wenno live stream.

tips.0: Usaren ti "Report" button direkta iti content.
tips.1: Mangted ti context no ti harassment ket paset ti trend wenno challenge.
tips.2: I-save ti video link sakbay a ma-delete wenno ma-hide.

snapchat.name: Snapchat
snapchat.overview: Mabalinmo nga i-report ti snaps, stories, ken profiles iti Snapchat nga adda pakaainaiganna ti harassment wenno bullying.

screenshots.0: Screenshot ti Snap (laglagipen a ti Snapchat ket ag-notify kadagiti users no ag-screenshot-ka).

tips.1: Usaren ti long-press feature iti Snap wenno Chat tapno ma-report a dagus.
tips.2: Kontaken ti local law enforcement no adda immediate danger.

instagram.name: Instagram
instagram.overview: Nadumaduma a wagas ti Instagram tapno i-report ti bullying, harassment, ken impersonation. Mabalinmo nga i-report ti posts, stories, profiles, ken comments.

tips.0: Usaren ti "Restrict" feature tapno ma-limit ti interactions nga saan a nag-block.
tips.1: I-report ti impersonation accounts babaen ti specific impersonation form.
tips.2: Idulin ti record ti report confirmation.

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.overview: I-encourage ti Facebook dagiti users nga i-report ti content a nag-violate ti Community Standards, karaman ti bullying ken harassment.

screenshots.0: Screenshot ti post, photo, wenno comment.

tips.0: Usaren ti "Find Support or Report" option iti content.
tips.1: Mabalinmo nga i-report para ti sabali a tao no isu ti gi-impersonate.
tips.2: I-block ti user kalpasan ti panag-report tapno maliklikan ti further contact.

discord.name: Discord
discord.overview: Seryosoen ti Discord ti harassment. Mabalinmo nga i-report ti messages direkta iti Trust & Safety team-da.

screenshots.0: Screenshot ti message(s) karaman ti timestamp.
screenshots.1: Screenshot ti User ID (i-enable ti Developer Mode iti settings).

tips.0: Saan nga i-delete ti messages sakbay nga ag-report, ta kasapulan ti Discord ti message links/IDs.
tips.1: I-report ti user via ti profile-da no ag-send-da ti unwanted DMs.
tips.2: Ipakaammo iti server moderators no ti harassment ket mapaspasamak iti specific server.

x.name: X (Twitter)
x.overview: Mabalinmo nga i-report ti accounts ken posts iti X para ti abusive behavior, harassment, ken hate speech.

tips.0: Mabalinmo nga i-report ti multiple posts iti maymaysa a report.
tips.1: Usaren ti "Mute" wenno "Block" features tapno saanmo a makita ti content.
tips.2: Mangted ti adu a context iti details section.

twitch.name: Twitch
twitch.overview: Mabalin nga i-report ti Twitch users dagiti streamers wenno viewers para ti harassment, hate speech, ken dadduma pay a violations bayat ti broadcast wenno iti chat.

screenshots.1: Screenshot ti stream no visual ti violation.

tips.0: Usaren ti "Report" button iti chat wenno iti channel page.
tips.1: Ibagam ti specific timestamp ken date ti insidente.
tips.2: Mabalin met a tumulong dagiti Channel moderators para kadagiti immediate chat issues.

xbox.name: Xbox Party Chat
xbox.overview: Mabalinmo nga i-report iti Xbox ti voice ken text harassment a mapaspasamak iti party chats wenno games.

screenshots.0: Photo wenno screenshot ti text message.
screenshots.2: I-report ti voice clip no allowed ti console ti voice reporting.

tips.0: Usaren ti "Report" feature direkta manipud iti player's profile.
tips.1: I-specify no napasamak ti harassment iti Party wenno bayat ti panag-game.
tips.2: Panatilihen nga updated ti console software para ti latest safety features.

playstation.name: PlayStation Party Chat
playstation.overview: Mangted ti Sony ti reporting tools para ti PlayStation Network tapno ma-handle ti harassment iti party chats ken messages.

screenshots.1: Photo ti screen no saan a possible ti screenshot.
screenshots.2: I-note ti PSN ID ti offender.

tips.0: Ag-report babaen ti "Options" menu iti message wenno player profile.
tips.1: Siguraduen nga i-report-mo ti specific content a harmful.
tips.2: I-block ti PSN ID tapno agsardeng ti communications.

tumblr.name: Tumblr
tumblr.overview: Adda policies ti Tumblr kontra ti harassment ken bullying. Mabalinmo nga i-report ti posts, blogs, ken messages.

tips.0: Usaren ti "Report" link a masarakan iti post wenno blog.
tips.1: I-specify ti nature ti abuse (e.g., harassment, hate speech).
tips.2: Mabalinmo met nga i-block ti blog tapno saanda a maka-interact kenka.

viber.name: Viber
viber.overview: Mabalinmo nga i-report ti messages ken accounts iti Viber nga ag-spam wenno nang-harass.

screenshots.1: Screenshot ti phone number wenno profile info ti sender.
screenshots.2: Screenshot ti aniaman a media a na-share.

tips.0: I-tap ken i-hold ti message tapno makita ti "Report" option.
tips.1: I-block a dagus ti number kalpasan ti panag-report.
tips.2: Agannad iti panag-share ti personal info iti public communities.
